## Abac class

Abstract class to implements Abac control Initialize as data sources to have context

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare abstract class Abac 
```

## Example


```
class MyAbac extends Abac {
  public Entity: EntityAbac
}
```
Then into index.ts

```
dataSources: () => ({
  abac: new MyAbac()
})
```
